member.name: T:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources.Cobweb_3D
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources.Cobweb_3D_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources.single_chromosome
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:COBWEB_3D.My.Resources.Resources.single_chromosome1
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.logDataToGraphs
member.summary: Logs data for each agent type to the excel graph sheets.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.swarming(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Enables swarming behaviour (if the neighbouring agents are facing a certain way then the current agent also faces and moves in the same direction), each swarm has a common destination (if agents in a swarm had different destinations, they would scatter).

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.tradezonemovement(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Agents go to the zone with the highest value (ie. global maximum); essentially test code (not used by the program).

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.locationutility(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Agents look at the central zone and the closest zone and determine the utility (based on distance) for both. Agents go to the zone resulting in the highest utility.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.abiotic(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: In the case of zones, agents scan their surroundings and go to the highest value zone they find (ie. could be local maximum or potentially the global maximum). This prevents agents from scanning their surrounding area to avoid slowing down the program.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.localturnenergy(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows turn energy to depend on the local region of the agent.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.staticagentcheck
member.summary: Makes sure that any new agents being placed (after changing the initial count) are static if the agent type was previously made static by the user

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.catalysispresence(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Indicates whether or not a catalyst is present in close proximity to the potential interaction.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.exchange(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Allows for exchanges (TODO: currently for currency and product only. a more general exchange should be made possible later).

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.drawRange(System.Drawing.Graphics@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Test code - produces a semi-transparent cube (made up of smaller cubes) to show the target range of an agent on the ZY view
member.param: The agent to show the target range of.

member.name: M:COBWEB_3D.Form1.sortAgentsZBuffer(COBWEB_3D.Prespective)
member.summary: Sorting is done as a "Z-buffer" for rendering - inefficient but we have no other choice. Agents with a smaller index (ie. 1, 2 etc) have a larger z-value
member.param: The prespective to determine the axis to be buffered as the projected Z-axis
